text: Midco (until 2016, was called Midcontinent Communications) is a regional cable provider. They give a triple play service of Cable television, Internet and telephone service. They give this service for North Dakota, South Dakota, some of Minnesota, and some cities in Kansas and Wisconsin. ==References== ==Other websites== * Midcontinent Communications website * Midco Connections website * Midco Sports Network website Category:American internet service providers Category:1931 establishments in the United States
title: Midco
